Html:
Hi friends out there

I was able to load module from module catalog which are on demand .They loads fine.I there view bind them with property.

But they are not even getting called .Is there something else to make it work after calling load method of region manger.I tried to put break point on viewmodel constructor in which i am passing interface of unitycontainer and regionmanager.

So please tell how to make it work .Because it seems like to me even though its load on region it sort of kind inactive as nothing work.like it did not get bind with viewmodel.Even i did constuctor injection of view model and bind view to viewmodel.

 

Thanks in advance.

Hi to all

I figured out there was small mistake i was doing in view model.

Thanks
